page_subtitle: Please read these terms carefully before using our services

sections.title: Services and Bookings
sections.content: Altaf Catering provides catering and event management services as described on this website. All bookings must be made at least 48 hours in advance and are subject to availability and confirmation. A booking request does not constitute a confirmed booking until you receive written confirmation from us.

sections.title: Payments and Deposits
sections.content: A deposit is required at the time of booking to secure your event date. Final payments must be made before the event as outlined in your booking confirmation. Payment methods and timelines are specified in the booking documents. Failure to pay within the specified time may result in cancellation of your booking.

sections.title: Cancellations and Refunds
sections.content: All cancellations must be communicated in writing. Cancellation fees may apply depending on notice period. Refunds will be processed as per booking terms. Non-refundable deposits will not be returned once services are confirmed. For postponements, we will attempt to reschedule subject to availability.

sections.title: Client Responsibilities
sections.content: The client must provide accurate event details (date, time, location, guest count) and ensure venue suitability for catering operations. Last-minute changes or delays may incur additional charges. The client is responsible for venue access and necessary permissions.

sections.title: Menu and Dietary Requirements
sections.content: We accommodate dietary needs (vegetarian, halal, allergies) when notified in advance. Menu items may vary based on ingredient availability. Altaf Catering reserves the right to make suitable substitutions when necessary while maintaining quality standards.

sections.title: Food Safety and Quality
sections.content: All food is prepared in hygienic conditions following safety guidelines. Food must be consumed within recommended timeframes. We are not responsible for issues arising from improper storage or delayed consumption after delivery or service.

sections.title: Event Setup and Equipment
sections.content: If Altaf Catering provides tables, chairs, utensils, or any other event equipment, it must be used responsibly and returned in the same condition. Any loss or damage to our equipment will be billed to the client at replacement cost.

sections.title: Damage or Loss
sections.content: The client will be held responsible for any damage to catering equipment, decorations, or property caused by guests during the event. Altaf Catering will not be liable for any damage to the client's property or venue unless caused by proven negligence of our staff.

sections.title: Staff Conduct
sections.content: Our staff members maintain professional behavior and hygiene standards. Any inappropriate treatment towards our staff will result in immediate service withdrawal without refund. We reserve the right to refuse service to any person behaving aggressively or inappropriately.

sections.title: Delivery and Timing
sections.content: We strive for punctual delivery and service. However, delays may occur due to traffic or weather. Altaf Catering is not liable for delays caused by circumstances beyond our reasonable control.

sections.title: Prohibited Items
sections.content: Altaf Catering does not provide alcoholic beverages. The client must ensure no illegal or prohibited items are used or consumed at the event venue.

sections.title: Force Majeure
sections.content: We are not liable for cancellations due to circumstances beyond our control (natural disasters, strikes, accidents, government restrictions). We will attempt to reschedule or provide credit notes in such cases.

sections.title: Intellectual Property
sections.content: All website content, including text, images, and logos, is Altaf Catering's property. You may not reproduce or distribute any content without written consent.

sections.title: Photography
sections.content: We may photograph events for marketing. If you don't want photography at your event, please notify us in writing beforehand.

sections.title: Liability Limitation
sections.content: Our liability for direct losses shall not exceed the total amount paid for the booking. We're not liable for indirect or consequential losses.

sections.title: Privacy Protection
sections.content: Your personal information is used only for service-related purposes and not shared with third parties without consent, except as required by law.

sections.title: Legal Framework
sections.content: These terms are governed by Pakistani law, with disputes handled by Pakistani courts.

sections.title: Complete Agreement
sections.content: These terms constitute the complete agreement. Verbal promises or external documents are not binding unless agreed in writing.

sections.title: Terms Updates
sections.content: We may update these terms anytime. Continued use of our services indicates acceptance of changes.

sections.title: Contact Us
sections.content: For questions about these terms, contact us at altafcatering@gmail.com or through our Contact page.
